article_node.title: I am a retailing expert and here are 3 ways AI-driven shopping will change the way you buy
article_node.summary: The article explains how AI, especially agentic AI, is reshaping retail by enhancing customer engagement, supply‑chain efficiency, and personalized shopping experiences. It highlights a consumer split—half excited, half nervous—underscoring the need to balance AI automation with human touch, privacy, and authenticity concerns. Retailers are urged to integrate AI tools seamlessly across digital and physical channels while preserving a human‑centric approach to maintain trust and satisfaction.
